sentences.sContent: Many of its practices seem anachronistic.
sentences.sCn: 它的很多做法似乎过时了。

remMethod.val: ana (错) + chron (时间) + istic → 生不逢时， 生错了时代 → 时代错误的

words.tran: 时代错误；不合潮流的人或物

trans.tranCn: 时代错误的； 过时的
trans.tranOther: You say that something is anachronistic when you think that it is out of date or old-fashioned
